title: Angel Bane: Book I & II
features: And there was war in Heaven…The classic tale of the eternal struggle of good versus evil is explored by Gregory Townes with ANGEL BANE; a chilling Magnum Opus of the Apocalypse. In the small town of Elgin, South Carolina a young boy named Enoch has dreams and visions of things no man has ever seen: the Great War in Heaven. Soon he finds himself caught in a terrifying crossfire as the powers of light and dark both covet him. Aided by a mysterious old man Enoch learns his destiny may just save the world…or destroy it.
description: Gregory Townes is the Author of the critically acclaimed novel, The Tribe and also The Ides of March.
